title: Vaccines - Center For Children and Families
author: Kelly Whitener
description: CCF is a health policy and research center dedicated to expanding and improving health coverage for America's children and families
cleaned_text: to Catch up on Routine Childhood Vaccinations](https://ccf.georgetown.edu/2023/01/19/new-data-underscores-need-to-catch-up-on-routine-childhood-vaccinations/) The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) released updated data on vaccination coverage among kindergartners, showing a continued decline in the share of children with the recommended doses of routine childhood vaccines needed to prevent the spread of harmful diseases. The report includes data on vaccination rates by state for
